G.T.5961
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 13th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
On the SELLE we have taken MONTRECOURT and have advanced to the outskirts of LIEU ST. AMAND.
We have crossed the SENSEE at AUBIGNY AU BAC where we took 100 prisoners.
We are withing a few hundred yards of DOUAI and have captured FAUBOURG d'ESQUERCHIN and DOUAI Prison and the greater part of FLERS. We have also made progress towards COURRIERES.
French Front.
The enemy has made a withdrawal on a wide front from the OISE to the AISNE at VOUZIERS.
The line now runs approximately as follows:- DUILLET (S. of the OISE) - ST. GOBAIN (surrounded on three sides) -PREMONTRE - BOURGUIGNON - S. of LAON to VORGES - then South-east to NEUVILLE - along the AILETTE to CORBENY - S. of AMIFONTAINE - then across the AISNE at NEUFCHATEL - along the AISNE to VOUZIERS.
A later message just received states that LA FERE (N. of the OISE) has been taken, that the outskirts of LAON have been reached and that the French are now North of the line AMIFONTAINE - BERRIEUX - AIZELLES (S.E of LAON).
2. ITALIAN & BALKAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
3. PALESTINE FRONT.
Our cavalry has reached BAALBEK.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
13t October, 1918.
Issued at 12.45 p.m.
